name: BetterSongSearch
description: Search and download songs with a lot of filtering and sorting options and without frustration!

name: Vent
description: I swear you just vented...
author: mineblock11

name: TooManyTweaks
description: Adds many togglable tweaks and options to tailor the game to your desire.

name: Speecil Tweaks
description: This mod brings a bunch of tweaks to the table, such as: Menu Tweaks, Gameplay Tweaks, Results Tweaks and more!
author: Speecil

name: AccessAbility
description: Gives more options to play Beat Saber, mainly made for those who can't play the game intended
author: Nuggo

name: Mapping Extensions
description:
This adds a host of new things you can do with your maps as a mapper, and allows you to play said maps as a player. An update of the port of the PC original mod by Kyle 1413. Previously maintained by zoller27osu.

Reminder: difficulties that require both Mapping Extensions and Noodle Extensions at the same time do not work. This is intended behaviour on Noodle's part.
author: StackDoubleFlow, rxzz0, rcelyte

name: MultiplayerCore
description: Port of MultiplayerCore, the PC mod that adds features to BeatTogether Multiplayer.
author: EnderdracheLP, cubic,Goobie

name: QuestSounds
description:
Allows users to change their sfx sounds and in-game music easily!

  Avoid using any files that use MPEG format like MP3 or MP2 unless you don't mind brief freezing upon loading

Sounds you can change and their default folder Path:
-  HitSounds:                       sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/HitSounds/
-  BadHitSounds:        sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/BadHitSounds/
-  NoteMissedSounds:    sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/NoteMissedSounds/
-  MenuMusic:                sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/MenuMusic/
-  MenuClicks:                sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/MenuClicks/
-  Firework:                          sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/Fireworks/
-  LevelCleared:                sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/LevelCleared/
-  LevelFailed:                sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/LevelFailed/
-  LobbyMusic:                sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/LobbyMusic/
author: Rugtveit, EnderdracheLP

name: Nya
description: Beat Saber mod for displaying nya-tastic images from various anime themed web APIs!

author: Oli

name: Acculight
description: changes the lighting on the result screen depending on the accuracy gained in the song

name: SessionQombo
description: A mod for beat saber that makes the combo counter persist across level load, like in the game `In The Groove`
author: Original by Headaassbtw, ported by Oli

name: Streamer Tools
description:
Allows applications to get information from the game like, currently played song.

Mod Features:
- Provide information about your game via wifi (more info: https://github.com/EnderdracheLP/streamer-tools/wiki)
- Provide your watchers with information about your song
by @EnderdracheLP and @ComputerElite

Client features:
- Various Overlays to add to OBS (including a overlay builder)
- Fetching of information from your Quest
by @ComputerElite

Client Download (needed on PC): https://github.com/ComputerElite/streamer-tools-client/releases
Mod Setup video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1OMHjjSi-5s
author: EnderdracheLP, ComputerElite, Lauriethefish, Phaze

name: RedBar
description: Change the color of your health bar according to your health
author: ComputerElite

name: Third Person mod
description:
Features:
- Play in third person
- Fix your camera to your saber
- Fix your camera
- Fly through the enviorment
author: ComputerElite

name: CrashMod
description: Crash your game if you are bad and good

description: Port of MultiplayerCore, the PC mod that adds features to BeatTogether Multiplayer.

name: BeatTogether
description: A multiplayer private server for the modding community. Supports crossplay between PC and Quest.

name: PitchBlaq
description: Simple plugin that can completely disable lights (events) and spectrogram (if the environment has one). Config menu include light and spectrogram.
author: Loloppe | Waffle

name: NoParticles
description: Allows you to disable various particles throughout the game

name: Colorama
description: Change the colors of the menu and other neat color related options.
